meta.name: AI-powered Client Onboarding with Jotform, Asana, Slack, and HubSpot

options.systemMessage: You are an agency AI agent for project scoping and team planning.

parameters.jsCode:
// Generate personalized proposal content const data = $input.first().json; const proposalContent = `

Project Proposal

For ${data.companyName}

Project Overview

Project Name: ${data.projectName}

Client: ${data.clientName}

Project Type: ${data.projectType}

Timeline: ${data.timeline}

Start Date: ${data.startDate}

End Date: ${data.endDate}

Project Scope

${data.projectScope}

Recommended Team

Team Size: ${data.teamSize} professionals

Estimated Hours: ${data.estimatedHours} hours

${data.suggestedTeam.map(role => `
${role}
`).join('')}

Investment

$${data.budget.toLocaleString()}

Estimated Hourly Rate: $${data.hourlyRate}

Project Deliverables

Phase Deliverable Timeline
Phase 1: Discovery Requirements Document, Wireframes Week 1-2
Phase 2: Design Visual Designs, Prototypes Week 3-4
Phase 3: Development Working Software/Assets Week 5-10
Phase 4: Testing & Launch QA Report, Final Delivery Week 11-12

Next Steps

  1. Review and sign this proposal
  2. Complete contract via DocuSign
  3. Attend kickoff meeting
  4. Provide initial assets and access
  5. Project begins on ${data.startDate}

Thank you for choosing our agency!

Questions? Contact us at hello@agency.com

`; return { json: { ...data, proposalHtml: proposalContent, proposalFileName: `Proposal_${data.companyName.replace(/\s/g, '_')}_${Date.now()}.pdf` } };

parameters.message:
=Hi {{ $json.clientName }},

Welcome aboard! We're thrilled to partner with {{ $json.companyName }} on {{ $json.projectName }}.

**What's Next:**

1. ‚úÖ Review your personalized proposal (attached)
2. ‚úçÔ∏è Sign the contract via DocuSign (link coming shortly)
3. üìÖ Join our kickoff meeting (calendar invite sent separately)
4. üí¨ Access your dedicated Slack channel for project updates
5. üöÄ Project kickoff on {{ $json.startDate }}

**Your Project Details:**
‚Ä¢ Budget: ${{ $json.budget }}
‚Ä¢ Timeline: {{ $json.timeline }}
‚Ä¢ Team Size: {{ $json.teamSize }} professionals
‚Ä¢ Priority: {{ $json.priority }}

**Your Dedicated Team:**
{{ $json.suggestedTeam.map(role => '‚Ä¢ ' + role).join('\n') }}

We've created a comprehensive project plan in Asana where you can track progress in real-time.

**Client Portal Access:**
URL: https://portal.agency.com
Username: {{ $json.clientEmail }}
(Password will be sent separately)

If you have any questions before we kick off, feel free to reply to this email or reach out via Slack.

Excited to get started!

Best regards,
The Agency Team

---
This is an automated onboarding email. Your dedicated project manager will be in touch within 24 hours.
parameters.subject: =üéâ Welcome to Our Agency - {{ $json.projectName }}

parameters.content:
üì© **TRIGGER: New Client Submission**

Captures comprehensive client details from Jotform:
‚Ä¢ Client/Company information
‚Ä¢ Project scope and requirements
‚Ä¢ Budget and timeline
‚Ä¢ Communication preferences

Create your intake form on [Jotform](https://www.jotform.com/?partner=mediajade)

**Required Form Fields:**
- Client Name
- Company Name
- Email & Phone
- Project Name & Type
- Budget & Timeline
- Project Scope (long text)
- Industry & Preferences

üßæ **PARSE & NORMALIZE**

Extracts and standardizes all client data from Jotform submission.

Handles multiple field name formats (q3_field, field, etc.)

Prepares clean data structure for downstream processing.

ü§ñ **AI AGENT - TEAM SUGGESTION**

Replaces the static logic node with a LangChain AI Agent:
‚Ä¢ Analyzes project input data
‚Ä¢ Suggests optimal roles & hours
‚Ä¢ Evaluates budget adequacy & priority
‚Ä¢ Generates justification text

üìÑ **PROPOSAL GENERATION**

Creates beautiful, branded HTML proposal:

‚Ä¢ Project overview
‚Ä¢ Recommended team
‚Ä¢ Investment breakdown
‚Ä¢ Deliverables timeline
‚Ä¢ Next steps

Ready for PDF conversion or DocuSign!

**Customize:**
Edit HTML template with your branding, colors, and logo.

üìä **PROJECT MANAGEMENT SETUP**

**Asana Project Creation:**
‚Ä¢ Creates new project
‚Ä¢ Sets timeline and notes
‚Ä¢ Links to client data

**Task Generation:**
‚Ä¢ 13 standard tasks
‚Ä¢ Auto-assigned to roles
‚Ä¢ Due dates calculated from start date
‚Ä¢ Customizable per project type

Phases: Discovery ‚Üí Design ‚Üí Development ‚Üí Testing ‚Üí Launch

üí¨ **SLACK WORKSPACE SETUP**

**Channel Creation:**
‚Ä¢ Private client-specific channel
‚Ä¢ Named: client-company-name
‚Ä¢ Topic set to project name

**Welcome Message:**
‚Ä¢ Project overview
‚Ä¢ Team introduction
‚Ä¢ Budget & timeline
‚Ä¢ Communication guidelines

**Team Invitations:**
Manually invite suggested team members or automate with Slack API!

‚úâÔ∏è **CLIENT COMMUNICATION**

**Welcome Email includes:**
‚úÖ Personalized greeting
‚úÖ Project details recap
‚úÖ Team introduction
‚úÖ Next steps checklist
‚úÖ Portal access info
‚úÖ Slack channel invite
‚úÖ Contact information

**Attachments:**
‚Ä¢ Proposal PDF
‚Ä¢ Getting Started Guide
‚Ä¢ Brand Guidelines

Fully customizable HTML template!

üìà **CRM & ANALYTICS**

**HubSpot Contact:**
‚Ä¢ Creates new contact
‚Ä¢ Sets lifecycle stage to 'customer'
‚Ä¢ Adds company details
‚Ä¢ Tags with project type
‚Ä¢ Lead status: OPEN

**Google Sheets Log:**
‚Ä¢ Complete client database
‚Ä¢ Project tracking
‚Ä¢ Budget & timeline data
‚Ä¢ Team assignments
‚Ä¢ Analytics & reporting

Connect to Data Studio for dashboards!
